summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding the cost basis of securities transferred. Richard Kahn provides details on the cost basis for various assets, while Rafael Otoya follows up to offer support regarding any questions on the matter.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn discusses the cost basis of securities transferred in an email to Rafael Otoya.

persons.name: Rafael Otoya
persons.context: Rafael Otoya follows up with Richard Kahn regarding questions about the cost basis of transferred assets.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is copied on the email correspondence regarding the cost basis of securities.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn provided a detailed report on the cost basis of several securities transferred.
The email correspondence took place on October 10, 2017.
Rafael Otoya reached out to Richard Kahn to offer support regarding questions on the cost basis.
The document contains confidential information related to financial transactions.
